Monday to Friday

4 p.m. to 9 p.m.

Modern Flavor, Southern Spirit

In the heart of The Warehouse District, Oak Steakhouse Raleigh brings a contemporary approach to the classic American steakhouse; where timeless hospitality meets modern Southern charm. Named among Raleigh Magazine’s Best Steakhouses and praised by The News & Observer for its commitment to quality, Oak has quickly become a destination for refined dining and memorable evenings.

The menu celebrates the finest cuts of Certified Angus Beef®, sourced for peak marbling and flavor, alongside fresh seafood and locally inspired dishes that reflect North Carolina’s rich culinary traditions. Signature plates include perfectly seared filets, roasted seasonal vegetables, and a rotating selection of chef-driven creations that evolve with the region’s harvest.

Set within a sophisticated yet inviting space, Oak Steakhouse Raleigh pairs warm hospitality with an atmosphere designed for every occasion; from intimate dinners to spirited gatherings. With its curated wine list, handcrafted cocktails, and thoughtful service, Oak offers an experience rooted in tradition yet defined by innovation.

[Page Title: Oak Steakhouse Charleston | Historic Downtown Steakhouse on Broad Street]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Oak Steakhouse Charleston
Reservations Slide 1 of 7 Slide 2 of 7 Slide 3 of 7 Slide 4 of 7 Slide 5 of 7 Slide 6 of 7 Slide 7 of 7 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
17 Broad Street, Charleston, SC 29401 (843) 722-4220 
Monday - Friday: 5 - 10 p.m.Saturday + Sunday: 4 - 10 p.m.
Dinner 
Parking

Valet service is available at the restaurant entrance for your convenience. Nearby public parking is also accessible, with the closest garage located at the just a short walk away.
East Bay/Prioleau Car Park Facebook Instagram 
A Charleston Classic

Located on Charleston’s storied Broad Street, Oak Steakhouse redefines the classic American steakhouse experience in a setting as unforgettable as the cuisine. Housed in a grand 1848 bank building, the restaurant spans three floors of preserved architectural splendor, featuring arched windows, soaring 20-foot ceilings, original ironwork, working fireplaces, and 150-year-old heart pine floors that speak to the city’s rich heritage.

Oak’s menu centers around Prime Certified Angus® Beef, sourced from top-tier producers and aged to perfection. Complementing the steaks is a thoughtful selection of locally and regionally sourced seafood, produce, and Lowcountry ingredients that reflect the bounty of the Southeast.

The wine list is equally impressive—highlighting bold California Cabernets, refined Old World reds, and over 200 labels curated to pair beautifully with the menu. With four distinct dining spaces, warm hospitality, and a balance of tradition and sophistication, Oak Steakhouse Charleston is a destination for memorable evenings, special occasions, and exceptional food done right.

Jacksonville

A Modern Classic in the Heart of Jacksonville

Oak Steakhouse Jacksonville brings the acclaimed legacy of its sister locations—recognized by Travel + Leisure, Atlanta Magazine, and Jezebel—to the heart of Northeast Florida. Located in a beautifully restored 100-year-old building with striking art-deco character, Oak offers an elevated dining experience rooted in tradition. Guests enjoy Prime Certified Angus Beef®, a seasonally driven menu featuring local and regional ingredients, a world-class wine list, and gracious, attentive service in a space that’s both sophisticated and welcoming.

(704) 954-8900 Facebook Instagram 
Where Classic Steakhouse Tradition Meets Southern Charm

Located in the vibrant SouthPark neighborhood, Oak Steakhouse Charlotte offers a contemporary take on the classic American steakhouse. Known for its impeccable service and sophisticated yet welcoming atmosphere, Oak has earned recognition from Charlotte Magazine and The Charlotte Observer for its elevated dining experience that combines timeless technique with modern creativity.

The menu highlights the finest cuts of Certified Angus Beef®, complemented by locally and regionally sourced seafood, produce, and seasonal specialties. Signature dishes like the dry-aged ribeye, house-cut filet, and buttery crab cakes are crafted with care and precision, while inventive sides and composed plates celebrate the flavors of the Carolinas. The bar program features an extensive wine list, handcrafted cocktails, and a thoughtful selection of bourbons that pair perfectly with each meal.

Inside, the warm glow of the dining room, accented by exposed brick, rich wood, and intimate lighting, sets the stage for every occasion, from business dinners and celebrations to memorable nights out. With a private dining room, lively bar, and attentive team dedicated to genuine hospitality, Oak Steakhouse Charlotte delivers an experience that’s as refined as it is inviting.

Bar MenuMonday - Friday: 5 to 6:30 p.m.

A Classic Steakhouse Reimagined in Historic Alexandria

in Old Town, Oak Steakhouse Alexandria brings its celebrated approach to the modern American steakhouse to one of the city’s most storied neighborhoods. Recognized by Eater DC and Northern Virginia Magazine for its elevated cuisine and gracious service, Oak offers a dining experience rooted in timeless tradition and driven by innovation.

The menu features Prime Certified Angus Beef® cuts, expertly prepared and complemented by locally sourced seafood, seasonal vegetables, and contemporary chef-driven dishes. Guests can expect everything from signature bone-in ribeye and seared scallops to inventive small plates designed to share. The carefully curated wine list and handcrafted cocktail program reflect Oak’s passion for balance, flavor, and craftsmanship.

Inside, the atmosphere blends modern sophistication with a nod to the building’s historic charm, rich wood, exposed brick, and ambient lighting create a setting that’s both intimate and inviting. Whether for a romantic dinner, a business gathering, or a celebration among friends, Oak Steakhouse Alexandria captures the best of Southern hospitality and steakhouse excellence in every detail.

Oak Steakhouse Atlanta

Hours & Location
950 Third Street, Alpharetta, GA 30009 (678) 722-8333 
Monday through Thursday5 p.m. to 10 p.m.Friday5 p.m. to 11 p.m.

Saturday4 p.m. to 11 p.m.

Sunday4 p.m. to 9 p.m.
Facebook Instagram 
A Modern Classic in the Heart of Avalon

Located in the heart of Alpharetta’s vibrant Avalon community, Oak Steakhouse brings a modern sensibility to the classic American steakhouse. Since opening, it has earned acclaim from Atlanta Magazine, Eater Atlanta, and Thrillist for its impeccable service, refined atmosphere, and culinary excellence. Oak combines the warmth of Southern hospitality with the sophistication of a city steakhouse, creating a destination for celebrations, business dinners, and evenings that call for something exceptional.

At the center of the menu is Certified Angus Beef®, hand-selected and aged to perfection—featuring signature cuts like the filet, New York strip, and bone-in ribeye. Seasonal seafood dishes, housemade pastas, and locally inspired sides round out the menu, while nightly specials showcase the creativity of the kitchen and the best ingredients from regional purveyors. Guests can also enjoy an award-winning wine list and expertly crafted cocktails that complement every plate.

The restaurant’s ambiance blends rustic charm and contemporary design, with leather banquettes, exposed brick, and an inviting glow from the open kitchen. Whether dining in the intimate dining room, relaxing at the lively bar, or gathering in one of the private spaces, Oak Steakhouse Alpharetta offers a timeless yet fresh approach to dining, one that continues to set the standard for steakhouses in the Southeast.

[Page Title: Oak Steakhouse Highlands | Elevated Mountain Dining at Skyline Lodge]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Oak Steakhouse Highlands

At Skyline Lodge
Slide 1 of 6 Slide 2 of 6 Slide 3 of 6 Slide 4 of 6 Slide 5 of 6 Slide 6 of 6 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
470 Skyline Lodge Rd, Highlands, NC 28741 828-482-4720 oakhighlands@theindigoroad.com 
Oak Steakhouse Hours

Bar:

Bar opens at 4 p.m.

Dinner:

&Sunday, Monday  Thursday 5 p.m. to 9 p.m.

Friday & Saturday  5 p.m. to 10 p.m.

Brunch:

Sundays 9 a.m. to 2 p.m.

*Walk-ins are welcome but reservations are strongly recommended

Monday Wine Night

On Mondays, enjoy half off bottles of wine priced up to $100. For bottles over $100, receive $50 off.
Facebook Instagram 
A Modern Steakhouse in the Mountains

Skyline Lodge’s second floor is home to Oak Steakhouse, a contemporary steakhouse featuring the finest cuts of Certified Angus Beef and locally sourced produce from area farms. The first and only steakhouse in Highlands, Oak partners with area purveyors and neighboring farms to bring the flavors of Appalachia right to the table.

Guests will enjoy a variety of starters, entrees, sides, and more, including Venison Wellington with mushrooms, pearl onion, prosciutto, and celery root puree, Sunburst Farms Trout with carrots, squash, caramelized cippolini, pepperonata, and gremolata; and, of course, a selection of Certified Angus Beef steaks. And for those with a sweet tooth, Oak Steakhouse offers delectable treats such as 8 Layer Chocolate Cake (which also happens to be gluten-free) and a house-made seasonal sorbet.

The beverage program at Oak features an expansive wine list that complements the restaurant’s culinary menus, an ever-evolving cocktail selection, a variety of local beers, spirit-free cocktails, and more. The menu features creative touches on classic libations. Guests are encouraged to enjoy their beverages “on the rocks and under the stars” on the property’s outdoor patio, which overlooks the lodge’s stone terrace and overhears the sounds of Big Creek Falls and Laurel Falls just below.

In addition to Oak, Skyline Lodge’s central lobby bar features expansive lounge seating, vaulted load-bearing ceilings, and two large scale fireplaces of hand-carved, locally quarried granite, and offers mid-century favorites such as Corpse Revivers, Manhattans, and Whisky Smashes as well as contemporary riffs on classics—nodding to the property’s 1960s roots.

A Modern American Steakhouse Above It All

Perched on the rooftop of , Oak Steakhouse brings its signature approach to the classic American steakhouse, where the finest cuts of steak, an uncompromising commitment to quality, and genuine hospitality set the stage for an unforgettable dining experience.
Hotel Avail in Rogers 
Rooted in tradition but driven by innovation, Oak’s menu highlights the highest-quality beef, sourced from the top producers within the Certified Angus Beef® portfolio, alongside locally inspired dishes that reflect the season. The bar program features a curated selection of wines, handcrafted cocktails, and a deep collection of bourbons and spirits to complement every meal.

With a stylish dining room, an intimate bar, private dining space, and an expansive outdoor terrace, Oak Steakhouse Rogers is a destination for celebrations, business gatherings, and indulgent evenings alike, where every detail is designed to elevate the moment.

Facebook Instagram 
Where Southern Warmth Meets Steakhouse Excellence

In the heart of downtown Nashville, Oak Steakhouse redefines the classic American steakhouse with a modern, chef-driven approach. Known for its uncompromising quality, the menu showcases the finest Prime Certified Angus Beef®—sourced from the top producers within the CAB portfolio—alongside seasonally inspired dishes that highlight the rich bounty of Appalachian ingredients.

More than just a steakhouse, Oak delivers an elevated dining experience where precision in the kitchen meets genuine hospitality at every turn. Whether you’re savoring a perfectly aged ribeye, sharing a selection of small plates, or toasting with a glass from the expertly curated wine list, every visit is a celebration of exceptional ingredients and thoughtful craftsmanship.

[Page Title: Oak Steakhouse Charleston | Historic Downtown Steakhouse on Broad Street]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Oak Steakhouse Charleston
Reservations Slide 1 of 7 Slide 2 of 7 Slide 3 of 7 Slide 4 of 7 Slide 5 of 7 Slide 6 of 7 Slide 7 of 7 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
17 Broad Street, Charleston, SC 29401 (843) 722-4220 
Monday - Friday: 5 - 10 p.m.Saturday + Sunday: 4 - 10 p.m.
Dinner 
Parking

Valet service is available at the restaurant entrance for your convenience. Nearby public parking is also accessible, with the closest garage located at the just a short walk away.
East Bay/Prioleau Car Park Facebook Instagram 
A Charleston Classic

Located on Charleston’s storied Broad Street, Oak Steakhouse redefines the classic American steakhouse experience in a setting as unforgettable as the cuisine. Housed in a grand 1848 bank building, the restaurant spans three floors of preserved architectural splendor, featuring arched windows, soaring 20-foot ceilings, original ironwork, working fireplaces, and 150-year-old heart pine floors that speak to the city’s rich heritage.

Oak’s menu centers around Prime Certified Angus® Beef, sourced from top-tier producers and aged to perfection. Complementing the steaks is a thoughtful selection of locally and regionally sourced seafood, produce, and Lowcountry ingredients that reflect the bounty of the Southeast.

The wine list is equally impressive—highlighting bold California Cabernets, refined Old World reds, and over 200 labels curated to pair beautifully with the menu. With four distinct dining spaces, warm hospitality, and a balance of tradition and sophistication, Oak Steakhouse Charleston is a destination for memorable evenings, special occasions, and exceptional food done right.
